description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below...
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement: W8485-237316/E

#### Notice Summary
The Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide HOOK, EJECTOR (GSIN: 1095, NSN: 1095-01-519-6503) to support military operations.

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237316/E
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Estimated Quantity**: 15 units (each)
* **Delivery Location**: 25 CFSD Montreal, Free Carrier (FCA)

#### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Currency**: [$]

#### Contact and Further Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **End User**: Department of National Defence
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Ryan Duncan, ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents
Available online at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/e08f727ec77849ed888ba71601d6ab33/w8485-237316_rfp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/e08f727ec77849ed888ba71601d6ab33/w8485-237316_rfp_eng.pdf) for English, and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/75f4e6974ef1507a73fef37c41d09b5f/w8485-237316_rfp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/75f4e6974ef1507a73fef37c41d09b5f/w8485-237316_rfp_fr.pdf) for French.

#### Languages
Documents may be submitted in
